title: WURFL is not installed
name: Drupal-8:acquiaWURFLDisabled
description: Create a symlink to your private files area.
remediation: Disable the WURFL module: `drush pm-uninstall wurfl -y`.
success: The WURFL module is not currently enabled.
failure: The WURFL module is currently enabled.

module.description: The name of the module to ensure is not installed.
